ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: considering we are spellcasters, we dont concern ourxelves with defense or offense, just spellcasting. it makes a lot of sense. that s why
ygData.messageBody:
<excerpt>

</excerpt>considering we are spellcasters, we dont concern ourxelves with
defense or offense, just spellcasting. it makes a lot of sense. that's
why you have tanks to take the damage, and the casters stay back and just
cast. i am level 26, and i RARELY melee, when i do it's because i just
made level and want to get all my skills maxxed. if you are in a good
party, at higher levels, you will never have to worry about getting
touched at all by a MOB. you should NOT be in melee at all, if you are
then your party is doing something wrong. the only time i get touched is
if someone trains by a bunch of MOBs that switch to me.


Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on
Cazic-Thule


>>>>

<excerpt>

<fontfamily><param>Arial</param><smaller>I cant really believe this. Are
we really that weak in defense ? At higher levels every critter will hit
us for max damage. If somebody knows if this is correct, please reply.

</smaller></fontfamily>

<fontfamily><param>Arial</param><smaller>When the Mobs have (level+1) * 5
and we have only 3, this would be dissapointing.

</smaller></fontfamily>

</excerpt><<<<<<<<




-------------------

tim borrelli

computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire

Volition, Inc.

timmyland@...
